description: This limited-edition denim jacket is a faithful reissue of a vintage Polo Sport jacket from the '90s. Its indigo-dyed twill fabric, logo hardware, and oversize fit are all true to the original piece.
fitting_details: Size medium has a 26¼" front body length, a 24¾" back body length, a 21½" shoulder, a 49¾" chest, and a 25¼" sleeve length. Sleeve length changes ½" between sizes.
Point collar. Buttoned placket. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Left chest patch pocket. Right chest buttoned pocket. Two front waist angled pockets.
Archival "Polo Sport Ralph Lauren" logo printed at the center back. Adjustable buttoned tabs at the back of the waist. Leather "Polo Ralph Lauren" patch at the back right waist.
Due to the natural characteristics of this material, the coloring may rub off onto fabrics and upholstery.
Model is 6'1"/185 cm and wears a size medium.
Returns will be accepted for all limited-edition Polo Sport items within 7 days of shipping date.
